preheader: Portfolio drops below inception value as markets turn risk-off
opening_paragraph: The GenAi Chosen portfolio fell -5.82% this week, bringing its total return to -3.01% since inception. The S&P 500 also declined, losing -1.41% for the week, while Bitcoin tumbled -12.10%. All three assets faced significant pressure as risk appetite faded across markets.

key_insights.title: Tech leads decline
key_insights.description: High-beta technology names sold off sharply, with Western Digital down -10.77%, Palantir off -9.52%, and Seagate sliding -8.40%.

key_insights.title: Gold fails defensively
key_insights.description: Newmont fell -8.59%, showing that gold miners were unable to provide their usual safe-haven support in the broader risk-off move.

key_insights.title: Cyclicals retreat too
key_insights.description: Travel and energy positions such as Royal Caribbean (-4.79%) and NRG Energy (-3.36%) also weakened as momentum reversed across cyclical sectors.

market_context: Markets shifted decisively into risk-off mode, pressuring growth, cyclical, and defensive sectors alike as sentiment weakened across asset classes.
